column2: King Co. Dept. of Public Safety

column1: Note:  Detail may not add to 100% because of rounding.  "Other" category is comprised primarily of air, water, and K-9 patrol.
*Patrol data are based on two 24-hour periods covering two target dates (a Wednesday and a Saturday) with routine patrol activity.
The figures presented in the table are averages based on the two selected target dates, and include only shifts of 7 hours or longer that
were actually worked on these dates.  Because data for shifts actually worked were unavailable, data for scheduled shifts were used for
the following agencies:  Dothan (AL) Police; Berkeley (CA) Police; Fullerton (CA) Police; Riverside (CA) Police; Plantation (FL) Police;
Pompano Beach (FL) Police; Chicopee (MA) Police; Lansing (MI) Police; Cleveland (OH) Police; Johnson City (TN) Police; Salt Lake City (UT) Police.
--- Data were not reported by an agency or an agency had no officers assigned to patrol shifts of 7 hours or longer during the designated 24-hour periods.
Table 11b.  Patrol allocation in State law enforcement agencies, 1993

column7: Average* patrol allocation during 24-hour period for shifts of 7 hours or longer

column15: Percent of patrol units assigned to:

column1: Note:  Detail may not add to 100% because of rounding.  "Other" category is comprised primarily of air, water, and K-9 patrol.
*Patrol data are based on two 24-hour periods covering two target dates (a Wednesday and a Saturday) with routine patrol activity.
The figures presented in the table are averages based on the two selected target dates, and include only shifts of 7 hours or longer that
were actually worked on these dates.  Because data for shifts actually worked were unavailable, data for scheduled shifts were used for
the State police agencies in the following States:  Mississippi, New York, Oregon, South Carolina, Utah, Washington, West Virginia.
--- Data were not reported by an agency or an agency had no officers assigned to patrol shifts of 7 hours or longer during the designated 24-hour periods.
